alert.note: Alert for Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 10:37AM PST until December 28 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds expected along exposed ridges and high terrain.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
